title: Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server
body:
Hello,
I can't connect to the League of Legends server.

it show's me the message: "Connection Failure: Unable to connect to the PVP.net server"

Can anybody tell me why and how I can fix it??

I use a Mac (OSX)

People showed on youtube how to fix it with keychain but I can't find the file in there. Maybe someone can help me with that how to fix it or why it doesn't show up

Thanks for your Help!!

ZetCrafting

replies.body:
There are a number of potential factors that could be at play and preventing your client from connecting to the PvP.net service. [This guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) offers a comprehensive list of steps to take in order to rule out the easy stuff.

Let me know if this caused any change.

Hello Targons Blade,

Thanks for your reply

I found it out.
The problem was caused by a blocked Wifi. The Wifi blocked the connection to the PvP.net server. In the logs it showed me that.

But thanks for your help.
